headline: Why The Narrative Around Bright Horizons Family Solutions Is Shifting With Back Up Care Focus
summary: Bright Horizons Family Solutions has seen its fair value estimate edge down slightly to about $128.78 per share, as analysts adopt a touch more caution on the pace of its long term revenue growth. At the same time, a marginally higher discount rate of roughly 7.66% reflects a more balanced view of macro and execution risks, even as optimism around the underappreciated back up care opportunity remains intact. Stay tuned to learn how you can track these subtle shifts in assumptions and stay...
